dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3812155J] Trademark Infringement @ www.brandstreets.com
dmca.body:
Please re-send the below-pasted complaint since there is no attachment. Sorry for the inconvenience. Legal Response Team -----Original Message----- From: steven.costello@tiffany.com [mailto:steven.costello@tiffany.com] Sent: Tuesday, April 10, 2007 9:50 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3812155J] Trademark Infringement @ www.brandstreets.com ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Trademark Infringement @ www.brandstreets.com Added by system at Tuesday, Apr 10 2007 02:41 pm X-MailFrom: Steven.Costello@Tiffany.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Tue Apr 10 14:41:47 2007 Received: (qmail 22170 invoked by alias); 10 Apr 2007 19:41:46 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 22157 invoked from network); 10 Apr 2007 19:41:43 -0000 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 10 Apr 2007 19:41:43 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 10 Apr 2007 14:41:42 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Tue, 10 Apr 2007 14:41:42 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from Steven.Costello@Tiffany.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HbMDl-0001pR-RY for Abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 10 Apr 2007 14:41:42 -0500 Received: from mx1.tiffany.com ([12.166.46.40]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from Steven.Costello@Tiffany.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HbMDh-0008Ih-Aw for Abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 10 Apr 2007 14:41:37 -0500 Received: from py1mxmbxp02.tiffco.net ([172.16.124.134]) by mx1.tiffany.com with ESMTP; 10 Apr 2007 16:05:13 -0400 X-SBRS: None X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C77BA8.3A344BC3" Subject: Trademark Infringement @ www.brandstreets.com Date: Tue, 10 Apr 2007 15:41:26 -0400 Message-ID: <7B920287E5A3FB48A4E1794A2283A44002E44B5D@py1mxmbxp02.tiffco.net> X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Trademark Infringement @ www.brandstreets.com Thread-Index: Acd7qDohqxtOfEGLScigtvDagQKibw== From: "Costello, Steven" To: , , Cc: "Pollard, John" , "Zalewska, Ewa" X-OriginalArrivalTime: 10 Apr 2007 19:41:42.0955 (UTC) FILETIME=[440997B0:01C77BA8] (multipart/mixed) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) To Whom It May Concern: Please see the attached Digital Millennium Counterfeit Act Sheet for www.brandstreets.com Please remove all infringing items as soon as possible as the items listed on this site are in violation our trademarks. Thanks in advance Steven Costello Tiffany & Company Security Administrator Security Services / Strategic Planning Steven.Costello@Tiffany.com 973-254-7483 (Phone) 973-254-7489 (Fax) 973-215-2854 (E-Fax) The information contained in this email message may be privileged, confidential, and protected from disclosure. Any unauthorized use, printing, copying, disclosure, dissemination of or reliance upon this communication by persons other than the intended recipient may be subject to legal restriction or sanction. If you think that you have received this E-mail message in error, please reply to the sender and delete this email promptly. MIME element (text/html)

To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please see the attached Digital Millennium Counterfeit Act Sheet for www.brandstreets.com< /span>

 

Please remove all infringing items as soon as possible as the items listed on this site are in violation our trademarks.

 

Thanks in advance

 

 

Steven Costello

 

Tiffany & Company

Security Administrator

Security Services / Strategic Planning

Steven.Costello@Tiffany.com

973-254-7483 (Phone)

973-254-7489 (Fax)

973-215-2854 (E-Fax)
